Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurrences across all cases
Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that immediately precede SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 where SW-Reviewer Agreed eventually occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants that lead to SW-EIC Accept compared to those leading to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers but before any reviewer response (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 per case in the review process for manuscripts undergoing major revision versus minor revision
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are part of repeated invitation cycles (i.e., preceded by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases where the reviewer selection phase exceeded its due date (e.g., after SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that do not result in any subsequent reviewer action (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response) within 7 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 relative to the total number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that ultimately conclude with a final editorial decision (SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in the context of challenge papers (e.g., following SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurring in revised submission phases (after Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation) versus initial submission phases
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
